title: Gold V to Silver I
body:
Is it hard to get demoted from Gold V to Silver 1? I'm currently in Gold V 0LP and since it's almost at the end of the season I'm afraid of playing any more ranked games in case I lose then I get demoted. So I would like to know how many games will it take for me to go back to Silver? 
Thanks

replies.body: Your MMR has to fall to Silver V before you will be demoted from Gold V to Silver, so it would have to be a pretty big loss streak.
If I were you I'd stop ranked until end of season to secure border for next year.
